alterations.value: Landlord shall construct the Expansion Space per mutually approved plans and finishes represented on Exhibit A (Landlord’s Work). Landlord provides an Improvement Allowance up to $55.00 per RSF of the Expansion Space, totaling $65,450.00, to be used for design, engineering, architectural services, and construction of Landlord’s Work; no portion of the Allowance may be applied to Tenant’s furniture, trade fixtures, equipment, or data cabling. Tenant-requested change orders and any costs exceeding the Allowance are at Tenant’s sole expense; Landlord-requested change orders are at Landlord’s expense. All proposed change orders require mutual approval by Landlord and Tenant.

Base Rent at the expanded RSF starts on ECD (subject to proration if mid-month).

Effective on ECD, Tenant’s Proportionate Share is adjusted to 8%, calculated as 18,284 RSF (Premises) divided by 226,468 RSF (Building).

tenant_obligations.description: Pay adjusted Base Rent for the expanded Premises beginning on the Expansion Commencement Date; if ECD occurs mid-month, pay prorated rent; monthly base rent may later be adjusted based on RSF verification.
Provide subtenant’s financial information to Landlord and obtain Landlord’s prior written approval or consent for any sublease; Landlord’s consent shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed.
Bear the cost of Tenant-requested change orders and any costs of Landlord’s Work that exceed the Improvement Allowance.

landlord_obligations.description: Construct the Expansion Space per mutually approved plans and finishes (Landlord’s Work) and deliver possession with Landlord’s Work complete; Exhibit A depicts the plans/finishes.
landlord_obligations.citation: Bayer 2017-09-14 Lease 1st Amendment.pdf Page 1; Bayer 2017-09-14 Lease 1st Amendment.pdf Page 2; Bayer 2017-09-14 Lease 1st Amendment.pdf Page 4

landlord_obligations.description: Provide an Improvement Allowance up to $55.00 per RSF of the Expansion Space, totaling $65,450.00, for design, engineering, architectural services, and construction of Landlord’s Work; not for furniture, trade fixtures, equipment, or data cabling.
Pay all costs of any Landlord-requested change orders; all change orders require mutual approval by Landlord and Tenant.
Provide additional parking spaces resulting in a total allocation of 82 spaces for Tenant.

audit_and_exceptions.description: Premises RSF post-expansion (18,284 RSF) must be verified by measurement upon completion of the Expansion Space; monthly base rent may be adjusted accordingly.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Obtain final measurement certificate upon completion; update RSF and rent ledger if any variance is found.
audit_and_exceptions.citation: Bayer 2017-09-14 Lease 1st Amendment.pdf Page 1; Bayer 2017-09-14 Lease 1st Amendment.pdf Page 2

audit_and_exceptions.description: ECD is the earlier of Tenant business occupancy or 14 days after delivery with Landlord’s Work complete, and no later than November 1, 2017.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Collect delivery notice, substantial completion confirmation, and move-in evidence to establish ECD; set rent start and proration accordingly.

audit_and_exceptions.description: If ECD occurs mid-month, Monthly Base Rent must be prorated. RSF verification may further adjust monthly rent.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Align billing proration with actual ECD; re-calculate monthly rent upon receipt of final RSF measurement.

audit_and_exceptions.description: Tenant’s Proportionate Share adjusts to 8% effective on ECD, based on 18,284 RSF Premises / 226,468 RSF Building.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Update OpEx and real estate tax pass-throughs to 8% effective ECD; confirm building RSF baseline remains 226,468 RSF.

audit_and_exceptions.description: Net worth requirement of at least $100,000,000.00 is deleted. Subletting requires Landlord’s prior written approval or consent, not unreasonably withheld or delayed, and Tenant must provide subtenant’s financial information. The sentence allowing assumption by a subtenant with equal or greater creditworthiness is deleted.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Update lease abstract to remove net worth threshold; require financials and obtain written Landlord consent for any subleases.

audit_and_exceptions.description: Tenant is entitled to additional parking spaces for a new total of 82 spaces.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Update parking records and access devices to reflect 82-space allocation.

audit_and_exceptions.description: TI Allowance of $65,450.00 is limited to design/engineering/architectural services and construction of Landlord’s Work; not for furniture, trade fixtures, equipment, or data cabling. Tenant pays for Tenant-requested change orders and any costs exceeding the Allowance.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Establish a TI budget and cost tracking; pre-clear eligible costs; route any change orders for mutual approval; bill Tenant for any overages or Tenant-requested changes.

audit_and_exceptions.description: Exhibit A shows the mutually approved plans/finishes for the Expansion Space.
audit_and_exceptions.suggested_next_step: Archive Exhibit A with the lease file and use it as the basis for Landlord’s Work scope verification.
